CustomField.description: By default, this is the date specified in the proposed disbursal date in the account details. If the date is modified during loan disbursal, the repayment schedule is regenerated accordingly.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: By default, this is the date specified in the proposed disbursal date in the account details. If the date is modified during loan disbursal, the repayment schedule is regenerated accordingly.
CustomField.label: Disbursal Date
